# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions.closeAuctionForBidder() method

Close the english auction for the bidder

## Example

```javascript
// The ID of the auction you want to close
const auction = "0";
await contract.englishAuctions.closeAuctionForBidder(auctionId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
closeAuctionForBidder(auctionId: BigNumberish, closeFor?: string): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description                                                                                       |
| --------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| auctionId | BigNumberish | the auction id to close                                                                           |
| closeFor  | string       | _(Optional)_ optionally pass the winning bid offeror address to close the auction on their behalf |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)&gt;

the transaction result

## Remarks

Closes the Auction and executes the sale for the buyer.
